title: A sermon touching the peace and edification of the church preached at the second triennial visitation of the right reverend father in God, Francis Lord Bishop of Peterborough, at Daventry in Northamptonshire, July 12. 1637 / by Edvvard Reynolds ...
author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.
publisher: Printed for Robert Bostock, at the signe of the Kings Head in St Paul's Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
